Title: structureToProtobufSchema
Description: Converts ClickHouse table structure to Protobuf schema.
structure — Table structure in a format column1_name column1_type, column2_name column2_type, ....root_message_name — Name for root message in Protobuf schema. Default value - Message;
Examples: SELECT structureToProtobufSchema('column1 String, column2 UInt32, column3 Array(String)') FORMAT RawBLOB
SELECT structureToProtobufSchema('column1 Nullable(String), column2 Tuple(element1 UInt32, element2 Array(String)), column3 Map(String, String)') FORMAT RawBLOB
SELECT structureToProtobufSchema('column1 String, column2 UInt32', 'Root') FORMAT RawBLOB
